summary: After discovering her late father once married a rodeo queen, an attorney travels into horse country and finds more family.
cast: Melissa Gilbert|Lindsay Wagner|Brian Wimmer|Lindy Newton|Nan Martin|Robert Mailhouse|Grainger Hines|Nancy Atkinson|Amy Beth Reece|Ryan Carnes|Sondra Currie|Martin Papazian|Jennifer Jean Cacavas|David McQuade|Ivan Naranjo
title: Lazos secretos
